Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: geenyHexEncodedString()
Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Displays the data as a hex String, useful for debugging of BLE devices

Enums/CharacteristicWriteType.html#/s:12.name: withResponse
Enums/CharacteristicWriteType.html#/s:12.abstract: A characteristic value is to be written, with a response from the peripheral to indicate whether the write was successful.

Enums/CharacteristicWriteType.html#/s:12.name: withoutResponse
Enums/CharacteristicWriteType.html#/s:12.abstract: A characteristic value is to be written, without any response from the peripheral to indicate whether the write was successful.

Enums/CharacteristicWriteType.html.name: CharacteristicWriteType
Enums/CharacteristicWriteType.html.abstract: Values representing the possible types of writes to a characteristic’s value.

Enums/APIError.html#/s:12GeenyGateway8AP.name: invalidJSON
Enums/APIError.html#/s:12GeenyGateway8AP.abstract: The JSON response received has invalid schema or content.

Enums/APIError.html#/s:12GeenyGateway8AP.abstract: The given ThingTypeId during the registration process

Enums/GatewayError.html#/s:12GeenyGatewa.name: busyPleaseRetryLater
Enums/GatewayError.html#/s:12GeenyGatewa.abstract: Gateway SDK is performing an ongoing operation and cannot handle

Enums/GatewayError.html#/s:12GeenyGatewa.name: pleaseRetryLater
Enums/GatewayError.html#/s:12GeenyGatewa.abstract: Due to some unexpected issues the operation could not be completed.

Enums/GatewayError.html#/s:12GeenyGatewa.name: invalidUUIDString
Enums/GatewayError.html#/s:12GeenyGatewa.abstract: The given UUID string is not a valid UUID.

Enums/GatewayError.html#/s:12GeenyGatewa.name: thingIsNotGeenyNative
Enums/GatewayError.html#/s:12GeenyGatewa.abstract: The Thing is not Geeny-native thus not yet supported.

Enums/GatewayError.html#/s:12GeenyGatewa.name: illegalInternalState
Enums/GatewayError.html#/s:12GeenyGatewa.abstract: Associated peripheral of the Thing can’t be found

Enums/APIError.html.name: APIError
Enums/APIError.html.abstract: Errors during API calls to the backend.

Enums/ScanError.html#/s:12GeenyGateway9S.name: timeout
Enums/ScanError.html#/s:12GeenyGateway9S.abstract: Scan could not start before time runs out.

Enums/ScanError.html#/s:12GeenyGateway9S.name: poweredOff
Enums/ScanError.html#/s:12GeenyGateway9S.abstract: Bluetooth is turned off therefore no scan is possible.

Enums/ScanError.html#/s:12GeenyGateway9S.name: unsupported
Enums/ScanError.html#/s:12GeenyGateway9S.abstract: Bluetooth is not supported, for example when running in Simulator.

Enums/ScanError.html#/s:12GeenyGateway9S.name: invalidStatePleaseTryLater
Enums/ScanError.html#/s:12GeenyGateway9S.abstract: CBCentralManager is not ready yet. Please try again later.

Enums/ScanError.html.name: ScanError
Enums/ScanError.html.abstract: Possible errors during the scanning for Things.

Bluetooth LE.html#/s:12GeenyGateway15Sca.name: ScanResultBlock
Bluetooth LE.html#/s:12GeenyGateway15Sca.abstract: Completion block of scanning things. If successful, an array of ThingInfo

Bluetooth LE.html#/s:12GeenyGateway15GAT.name: GATTResultBlock
Bluetooth LE.html#/s:12GeenyGateway15GAT.abstract: Completion block of GATT detection. If successful, a ThingInfo object

Structs/GeenyThingInfo.html#/s:12GeenyGa.name: protocolVersion
Structs/GeenyThingInfo.html#/s:12GeenyGa.abstract: Protocol version number of the Geeny Information Service.

Structs/CharacteristicProperties.html#/s.name: broadcast
Structs/CharacteristicProperties.html#/s.abstract: The characteristic’s value can be broadcast using a characteristic configuration descriptor.

Structs/CharacteristicProperties.html#/s.name: writeWithoutResponse
Structs/CharacteristicProperties.html#/s.abstract: The characteristic’s value can be written, without a response from the peripheral to indicate that the write was successful.

Structs/CharacteristicProperties.html#/s.name: write
Structs/CharacteristicProperties.html#/s.abstract: The characteristic’s value can be written, with a response from the peripheral to indicate that the write was successful.

Structs/CharacteristicProperties.html#/s.name: notify
Structs/CharacteristicProperties.html#/s.abstract: Notifications of the characteristic’s value are permitted, without a response from the central to indicate that the notification was received.

Structs/CharacteristicProperties.html#/s.name: indicate
Structs/CharacteristicProperties.html#/s.abstract: Indications of the characteristic’s value are permitted, with a response from the central to indicate that the indication was received.

Structs/CharacteristicProperties.html#/s.name: authenticatedSignedWrites
Structs/CharacteristicProperties.html#/s.abstract: Signed writes of the characteristic’s value are permitted, without a response from the peripheral to indicate that the write was successful.

Structs/CharacteristicProperties.html#/s.name: extendedProperties
Structs/CharacteristicProperties.html#/s.abstract: Additional characteristic properties are defined in the characteristic extended properties descriptor.

Structs/CharacteristicProperties.html#/s.name: notifyEncryptionRequired
Structs/CharacteristicProperties.html#/s.abstract: Only trusted devices can enable notifications of the characteristic’s value.

Structs/CharacteristicProperties.html#/s.name: indicateEncryptionRequired
Structs/CharacteristicProperties.html#/s.abstract: Only trusted devices can enable indications of the characteristic’s value.

Structs/CharacteristicInfo.html#/s:12Gee.name: properties
Structs/CharacteristicInfo.html#/s:12Gee.abstract: properties describe if the characteristic supports read / write / notify / indicate / etc.
